channel.title: Blog on Liam Bessell
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Liam Bessell

item.title: Colorado August 2021
item.description: Leadville First stop in Leadville was a very good pizza place called High Mountain Pies. 10/10, would recommend their “Crocodile Pizza”. Mt. Elbert We woke up at 0530 and were on the trail by 0620. The first part of the hike took us through a fantasy-like aspen forest. My first 14er, Mt. Elbert! What’s nice about this trail is that there wasn’t any rock scrambling required. So, although it is a long hike and there is a lot of elevation gain (~5000 ft for us), there’s no climbing required.
